mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a photograph of a man and woman on horseback, Harry Thomas Walker and his cousin Vernita Jones. The handwritten notes on the back of the photo include a date but it is difficult to read; it may be 1910 or 1915. The other notes read: "At farm near the spring. Harry Thomas Walker. Vernita Jones, cousin -- Sam Jone's daughter. H. L. Walker's brother" [with an arrow indicating the last statement applies to Sam Jones]
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Harry Thomas Walker and Vernita Jones, Cousins, c. 1910 (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: African Americans -- Portraits
Virginia -- Lexington
Twentieth century
